snippet.title: Star Wars Hunters – Pre-download Trailer – Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Choose your Hunter and fight for glory in the Arena! Step into the world of Star Wars: Hunters™ and battle as heroes of the Rebellion, Imperial stormtroopers and everything in between in this new 4v4 arena shooter.
 
Join forces with friends and conquer the battlefield on your journey to fame in the Arena. Dive into this free-to-play experience where strategy and skill pave the way to victory.
Customize each Hunter by collecting and equipping them with fun and unique costumes, animations, and weapon appearances, making for an impressive competitor that stands out on the battlefield and is ready to challenge for glory.

Pre-download this free-to-play game today, and battle for galactic glory on #NintendoSwitch June 4th!
https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/star-wars-hunters-switch/

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
